featured.text: But this story written 40 years ago __(27)__ predicted the arrival of a recent method of genetic engineering—cloning.
Scientists agree that synesthesia has a genetic basis, because it frequently runs in families.
Not all dimples are formed by a genetic defect, though; some may appear due to the 36 of excessive fat on the face.
Will the genetic copies of a human really have “one mind” as __(28)__ in this story?

other.text: Though often associated with beauty, most dimples are actually a genetic 33 caused by shortened facial muscles.
Cloning is the genetic process of producing copies of an individual.

definition.example: Genetic research has advanced our understanding of many diseases.
